headline.main: HALIFAX PLEDGES AID; Says Britain Will Help Us Restoring Philippines

lead_paragraph: NORTHFIELD, Vt., June 1 -- Recalling the part played in the Philippines by a graduate of Norwich University, Admiral Dewey, hero of Manila Bay in the Spanish-Amrican War, Lord Halifax, British Ambassador to the United States, speaking today to the Army aviation students in training in Norwich, pledged the cooperation of Great Britain in restoring those islands to this country
abstract: PI: Amb Halifax pledges Brit aid to US in recovery
